"溶岩窟を統べる希少種":
"I received a rather shocking report. It
appears the Vol Dragon species has a
variant. I call it the Burn Draal. It
seems to reign over the cuevas volcanicas,
y we of the research institute want to
be the first to conduct a detailed study
on it.

Could you defeat it like you always do?
※Objetivos are Nv.41+ Burn Draals."
